transcripts.text: Greetings!  This is Indian in the Machine, and we have some incredible intel today from Saint Germain, channeled by Nagari.  So, it comes to us now translated from another language, and the translations are a little bit sketchy and the sentences can be somewhat confusing.  However, the Intel here is extremely important.  So I'm going to read as much as I can of the original words translated, and I will skip through confusing sentences and try to add in what I think their meaning is.  So a little bit different this time around, but the Intel is worth it.  Beloved brothers and dear sisters, I haven't spoken directly to you in a while through this channel, but today I was asked by our Nagari to tell much truth about what is going on right now on Earth.  As you know, President Trump is doing everything possible to implement NASARA at the internal level in the United States and JASARA at the global level in the 209 nations that have signed that law.  The draining in the swamp in America came about with the discreet help of the Galactic Federation.  the Ascended Masters, and the Alliance, composed of BRICS countries Brazil, Russia, India, China, and South Africa.  North American troops are already in several countries to arrest elite members of the Deep State living in those countries.  The US military has also rescued more than 500,000 children saving them from the world's satanic elite.  It has also restored the Republic in the United States, which thus ceases to be a private corporation in the hands of a few cabal families.  Likewise, there is a return to the original US Constitution.  There's a new coin, which can only be produced by the United States Treasury.  Soon the other countries will be deploying Jisara and then there will be a single currency backed by real wealth and it will be digital because it will be part of the quantum financial system which is already working, although it has not been disclosed yet.  Although their evil plans are being disclosed with the intention of people fearing them, don't consider it.  Quantum computers are already being used equipped with alien-gen technology unknown on Earth, moved by plasma and tachyonic energy, as well as possessing artificial intelligence.  The cabal can never hack that system, nor promote money laundering operations or steal from citizens.  You will all have your account and you can manipulate that account freely.  Because the quantum computer detects immediately and in real time, any attempt at fraud, theft or whatever automatically blocks the requested transaction.  I ask you, my friends, not to be afraid.  I assure you, you and your families are safe.  Nobody will be left without money, for them and their family.  The cabal is trying to save its power and is giving its last attempts, adapting a global burned land policy.  Their policy is if they can't have it, no one can.  But their strength is running out and they know it.  Every day there is a new victory of the light.  There are more arrests every day.  Most of that planetary elite is already behind bars at Guantanamo.  or under house arrest.  We will no longer allow them their onslaught against humans, and we have eliminated any attempt at a third world war.  Galactics have neutralized all of Earth's atomic arsenal.  Every citizen will have more than enough to have a roof, food on the table, and health for everyone.  Whether or not you have a job, there will always be money in your account.  The role of banks will be another completely different.  With the new financial system, there will be forgiveness of all bank debts.  They already started cancelling the debt of the poorest countries.  Mortgage and credit or debit card debts will be forgiven anyway.  It will be a way to give people back at least part of what they've been robbed, all of their lives.  Water, light and heating bills will be removed due to opening free energy patents.  Energy becomes free and free to all, no matter where in the world you live.  Plus, income tax is also being eliminated.  There will be a single tax of 14% on consumer goods excluding medicines, foods, homes or second hand cars and especially whatever is first needed for life on earth.  Everyone will have replicating machines that can instantly replicate everything be it food, clothing or whatever.  In fact, Life is going to be very different from everything people have known.  Earth will have a full-fledged galactic society.  There will no longer be people going hungry, violent, or anything that represents a low vibration, because the planet which is a living being is moving on to the fifth dimension and you with it.  There will be no hospitals, no vaccines, no sickness.  Every human will regain their freedom and live a prosperous, rich and happy life, and all of it is just around the corner.  So pay no attention to the catastrophic view of the cabal's plans.  They won't be fulfilled, I assure you.  I ask all of you to start celebrating the freedom of being and the victory of the strength of the light from now.  Wake up to that new and wonderful life of freedom to be that waits for you and be happy.  Give up fear and replace that feeling with love.  I leave you with all my love for each of you.  You were not alone, and you never were, and you never will be.  I am your brother and friend, Adamus Saint Germain.
